languages.text: "Этот дикарь дремуч и непросвещен. Почему у данной единицы есть ощущение, что она знает меньше, чем какой-то примитивный варвар?"
"This tribesman's mind is full of the most unenlightened superstition. Why does this unit seemingly know less than some primitive barbarian?"
languages.original_text: "Этот дикарь дремуч и непросвещен. Почему у данной единицы есть ощущение, что она знает меньше, чем какой-то примитивный варвар?"

traits.locale_text: "This tribesman's mind is full of the most unenlightened superstition. Why does this unit have the feeling that it knows less than some primitive barbarian?"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This tribesman's mind is full of the most unenlightened superstition. Why does this unit have the feeling that it knows less than some primitive barbarian?"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This tribesman's mind is full of the most unenlightened superstition. Why does this unit seemingly know less than some primitive barbarian?"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This tribesman's mind is full of the most unenlightened superstition. Why does this unit seemingly know less than some primitive barbarian?"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This tribesman's mind is full of the most unenlightened superstition. Why does this unit seemingly know less than some primitive barbarian?"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This tribesman's mind is full of the most unenlightened superstition. Why does this unit seemingly know less than some primitive barbarian?"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「部族民の精神は無知が極まっているがゆえに迷信に囚われきっています。なぜ、このユニットは原始的な未開人より知恵が足りないと見えるのでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "This tribesman's mind is full of the most unenlightened superstition. Why does this unit seemingly know less than some primitive barbarian?"

traits.locale_text: 「部族民の精神は無知が極まっているがゆえに迷信に囚われきっています。なぜ、このユニットは原始的な未開人より知恵が足りないと見えるのでしょうか？」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这个部落民的思想中充满了愚昧无知的迷信。可为什么本单位知道的事情，似乎比那些原始蛮人知道的还要少？”
languages.original_text: "This tribesman's mind is full of the most unenlightened superstition. Why does this unit seemingly know less than some primitive barbarian?"

traits.locale_text: “这个部落民的思想中充满了愚昧无知的迷信。可为什么本单位知道的事情，似乎比那些原始蛮人知道的还要少？”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Cet homme croit en des superstitions idiotes. Pourquoi a-t-il l'air d'en savoir moins que le barbare le plus primitif ? »
languages.original_text: "This tribesman's mind is full of the most unenlightened superstition. Why does this unit seemingly know less than some primitive barbarian?"

traits.locale_text: « Cet homme croit en des superstitions idiotes. Pourquoi a-t-il l'air d'en savoir moins que le barbare le plus primitif ? »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Este miembro de la tribu tiene la mente llena de supersticiones sin fundamento. ¿Por qué esta unidad parece saber menos que algunos bárbaros primitivos?».
languages.original_text: "This tribesman's mind is full of the most unenlightened superstition. Why does this unit seemingly know less than some primitive barbarian?"

traits.locale_text: «Este miembro de la tribu tiene la mente llena de supersticiones sin fundamento. ¿Por qué esta unidad parece saber menos que algunos bárbaros primitivos?».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Der Verstand dieses Stammesmannes ist voll unerleuchteten Aberglaubens. Warum weiß diese Einheit allem Anschein nach weniger als ein primitiver Barbar?"
languages.original_text: "This tribesman's mind is full of the most unenlightened superstition. Why does this unit seemingly know less than some primitive barbarian?"

traits.locale_text: "Der Verstand dieses Stammesmannes ist voll unerleuchteten Aberglaubens. Warum weiß diese Einheit allem Anschein nach weniger als ein primitiver Barbar?"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Bu kabile üyesinin zihni, aydınlığın çok uzağındaki hurafelerle dolu. Bu birim neden ilkel barbarlardan daha cahil duruyor?"
languages.original_text: "This tribesman's mind is full of the most unenlightened superstition. Why does this unit seemingly know less than some primitive barbarian?"

traits.locale_text: "Bu kabile bireyinin zihni, aydınlıktan en uzak kalmış hurafelerle dolu. Bu birim neden ilkel bir barbardan daha az şey biliyormuş gibi görünüyor?"
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
